text: is a Japanese footballer who plays for Yokohama F. Marinos. ==International== He made his debut for the Japan national football team on 26 March 2019 in a friendly against Bolivia, as a starter. ==Club statistics== Updated to 2 December 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 172 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 224 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2016J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑", 10 February 2016, Japan, (p. 244 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
